summary: This is an email chain from attorney Stacey Richman forwarding a message from Mark L. Epstein. The forwarded message contains threatening text messages received on May 19, 2020, referencing 'You will die' and a website globfone.com. The document appears to be legal correspondence regarding threats.

keyFacts: Threatening text messages were received on May 19, 2020, stating 'You will die' and referencing globfone.com.
Mark L. Epstein forwarded these threatening messages to attorney Stacey Richman on May 24, 2020.
Attorney Stacey Richman then forwarded this information to another party on May 25, 2020.
The document is legal correspondence with a confidentiality notice from the Law Offices of Richman Hill & Associates.
The email subject references 'Them the text threats #9', suggesting this may be part of a series of communications about threats.
